channel.title: Imagine - The New Definition For Custom Servers!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://imagine-ps.com/community/uploads/monthly_2016_05/Logo.png.09def65b764a7284dcb06023db7599b6.png[/img][/center]
[HR]
Links:
[ul][*][img]http://i.imgur.com/aOVfknV.png[/img] [url=http://www.imagine-ps.com/]Community Forum[/url] [*][img]http://i.imgur.com/S0vwpL4.png[/img] [url=http://imagine-ps.com/download/launcher.jar]Download[/url][/ul]
Developer Team:
[ul][*]Hank - Founder/Developer [*]Sam - Developer [*]Brian - Developer[/ul]
Background:
GadorX was a brilliant customs server and online for over 3 years. Sadly, the day has come where Sam is unable to dedicate the time required to run the server anymore, but he also didn't want to see the server die out. So, we came up with a solution!
The Imagine team will be continuing the GadorX legacy! We are also happy to announce that Sam will be remaining part of the team, as a part-time developer. If you're a previous donator on GadorX, we can refund your donator rank -- as long as you have the required proof. The server is online and we can't wait to see you in-game!
[HR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wIeG06Q.png[/img] Features Include: [ul][*]Over 30 In-game Bosses. [*]Wall safe crack minigame. [*]Milestones with comp capes with epic requirements. [*]Infinite money pouch. [*]Squeal of Fortune. [*]Achievements. [*]Full prestige system with shop (over 100 prestiges). [*]1mhpboss (OLD GADORX BOSS). [*]Over 1000 customs items obtainable out of 2000. [*]New home and shops! [*]Dominion Tower. [*]Ckey chest with percentage reward. [*]Clue scrolls. [*]Shadow Forger (UNIQUE BOSS). [*]Boss pets - 44 pets total , a lot custom made! [*]Wilderness skilling zone [*]Homerectus [*]Ecto zone [*]Customzone [*]Fpzone [*]SinSeer (Custom Boss). [*]Adventure log [*]New impling catcher minigame [*]Active Community Forums [*]& so many more brilliant features that we simply cannot list them all. So, join today and find out for yourself![/ul]
[HR]
[SPOILER=Media][center][IMG]http://image.prntscr.com/image/eb2b6e3d04614feea7768582cc6bc388.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z3OrP1Y.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KNCCSVx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3igxpBF.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eERB1f1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XU1vwt2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bsYROuL.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mO2HCWN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dMNmGKv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ACliMbk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/68MzaU1.png[/img][/center][/SPOILER]
[HR]

item.title: Imagine - The New Definition For Custom Servers!
item.dc:creator: @birdhouse919 birdhouse919
item.description:
@birdhouse919 wrote:

[center][/center]

[HR]

Links:

[ul][] Community Forum
[] Download[/ul]

Developer Team:

[ul][]Hank - Founder/Developer
[]Sam - Developer
[*]Brian - Developer[/ul]

Background:

GadorX was a brilliant customs server and online for over 3 years. Sadly, the day has come where Sam is unable to dedicate the time required to run the server anymore, but he also didn’t want to see the server die out. So, we came up with a solution!

The Imagine team will be continuing the GadorX legacy! We are also happy to announce that Sam will be remaining part of the team, as a part-time developer. If you’re a previous donator on GadorX, we can refund your donator rank – as long as you have the required proof. The server is online and we can’t wait to see you in-game!

[HR]

Features Include:
[ul][]Over 30 In-game Bosses.
[]Wall safe crack minigame.
[]Milestones with comp capes with epic requirements.
[]Infinite money pouch.
[]Squeal of Fortune.
[]Achievements.
[]Full prestige system with shop (over 100 prestiges).
[]1mhpboss (OLD GADORX BOSS).
[]Over 1000 customs items obtainable out of 2000.
[]New home and shops!
[]Dominion Tower.
[]Ckey chest with percentage reward.
[]Clue scrolls.
[]Shadow Forger (UNIQUE BOSS).
[]Boss pets - 44 pets total , a lot custom made!
[]Wilderness skilling zone
[]Homerectus
[]Ecto zone
[]Customzone
[]Fpzone
[]SinSeer (Custom Boss).
[]Adventure log
[]New impling catcher minigame
[]Active Community Forums
[*]& so many more brilliant features that we simply cannot list them all. So, join today and find out for yourself![/ul]

[HR]
